Reviews.Title: great digital picture in my rv from antenna.
Reviews.Author: FRANK POSILLICO
Reviews.Content: I purchased this to use in my RV.  So far it works great.  I have used it with my rooftop antenna for off the air broadcasts.  Good picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Jensen Ac/Dc TV
Reviews.Author: S. Zeh "rnszeh"
Reviews.Content: This television was purchased to replace the one that came in our truck camper.  It had to be an AC - DC so that it would work regardless of the electrical power being used.  It gets a great picture and pulls in all the channels it can with the antenna....worth the investment!!!!

ProductInfo.Features:
Jensen JE1911DVDC 19" AC/DC LCD/DVD Combo, Resolution 1440 x 900, integrated HDTV tuner (1080p, 720p & 480p), 16:9 aspect ratio and high-contrast ratio, 12 Volt DC
This JENSEN LCD TV runs on 12 Volt DC power so watch it as long as you want while out on the road (AC Adapter included)
DVD Player / 12v Adapter Combo (Not Shown). 110VAC Power, Integrated HDTV (ATSC) Tuner, HDTV Ready (1080p, 720p, & 480p), Convenient Front controls, Conformal coated circuit boards
Reinforced cabinet structure and mounting points, Optional table top stand (STD1909), Dual function wireless remote control included (TV/DVD), VESA 100mm x 100mm mounting pattern
IR repeater allows you to operate JENSEN DVD player with the dual, full function wireless remote control (included) with your JENSEN TV, RoHS compliant, Overall Dimensions: 20.4"W x 15.2"H x 3"D
ProductInfo.Name: Jensen JE1911DVDC 19" AC/DC LCD/DVD Combo, Resolution 1440 x 900, integrated HDTV tuner (1080p, 720p & 480p), 16:9 aspect ratio and high-contrast ratio, 12 Volt DC
